item.title: Legacy SDK Flaws Cause Stored XSS and Account Takeover
item.description:
‚Äî

Alright, let me tell you a fun story about how a casual day of hunting bugs turned into a serious jackpot ‚Äî all thanks to some forgotten open source library!

It started like any other day: coffee ready, Burp Suite fired up, and enthusiasm maxed out. I was testing a cool AI-driven reporting/training platform over at example.ai.

These folks were pretty solid when it came to securing their main endpoints; my usual payloads and tests didn‚Äôt reveal much initially. However, the moment I stumbled onto their /reports page, my curiosity went through the roof. This page was super interactive‚Äîit allowed users to create detailed, professional-looking reports with graphs, charts, images, markdown support, etc ..
